CustomNotificationType.name: CustomNotificationType
CustomNotificationType.description: Stores information about custom notification types.

CustomNotifTypeName.description: Specifies a notification type name. The notification type name is unique within your organization. The notification type name isn’t namespaced, so it can’t be duplicated across installed packages. Maximum number of characters: 80.

Description.description: Specifies a general description of the notification type, which is displayed with the notification type name. Maximum number of characters: 255.

Desktop.description: Indicates whether the desktop delivery channel is enabled (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

DeveloperName.description: Specifies the API name of the notification type.

Language.description: Specifies the language of the custom notification type. The value for this field is the language value of the org.

Mobile.description: Indicates whether the mobile delivery channel is enabled (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

NamespacePrefix.description: Specifies the namespace of the notification type, if installed with a managed package.
